definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
at the minimum/at the very least
standard weight (used on a balance scale)
to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode

sentences.english: She swipes an access fob, enters a PIN and attaches the hydrogen nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 她输入PIN码并接上氢气输气管。

sentences.english: Lastly, we designed coding plan of internal code of full information for mongolian information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 最后设计出了蒙古文信息处理全息内部码的编码方案。

sentences.english: I am pleased to inform that invitation code is no longer needed.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴告诉大家，现在不再需要邀请码了。

sentences.english: How to test the invitation code to get ah?
sentences.chinese: 怎么样才能获得测试的邀请码啊？

sentences.english: We can only supply you with 20000 yards of pure silk.
sentences.chinese: 咱们只能供给二万码的伪丝绸。

sentences.english: This is Yuli's recommendation to all foreign Chinese learners.
sentences.chinese: 这是尤里同学向外国汉字教学者推荐和码汉字学习法。

sentences.english: Increased the range of leatherworking drums to 40 yards.
sentences.chinese: 制皮制皮的战鼓作用范围增加到40码。

sentences.english: If you do this, you will earn the level's cheat code.
sentences.chinese: 如果你这样做，你就赚了水平的金手指码。

sentences.english: Returns a hashcode for this socket address.
sentences.chinese: 返回该套接字地址的hash码。

sentences.english: Are policy makers ready to do what it takes to break this vicious circle?
sentences.chinese: 决策者们准备采取措施打破这种恶性循环码？

sentences.english: We note that you want additional samples of 5 yards per color way to be dispatched by air.
sentences.chinese: 获悉贵方另要求航寄色位各5码样品，这是可以的。

sentences.english: The only proviso is that the bytecode modifications should be deterministic and predictable.
sentences.chinese: 惟一的要求是字节码修改应该是确定性的且可预测的。

sentences.english: You even run brandnew virus updates and signatures on the box, just to be sure.
sentences.chinese: 你确定你也升级了病毒库及特征码。

sentences.english: Change the current market, anti-theft devices are generally fixed code deficiencies.
sentences.chinese: 改变了目前市场上普遍防盗器均采用固定码的缺陷。

sentences.english: They should be able to score from 12 yards.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该能从12码的位置射门得分。

sentences.english: But the track seemed to vanish a hundred yards from where I stood.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我所站的地方一百码之外，小路似乎消失了。

definition: number (e.g. page or house number)/numeral (e.g. Arabic or Chinese numeral)/code sign/plus or minus sound/counter/chip (e.g. in gambling games)/price tag/ready cash at one's disposal (old)
to announce the winners in a lottery
to win a prize/a successful gamble
repeated code/coincident code (i.e. two characters or words having the same encoding)
to scan a QR code or barcode
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
the units place (or column) in the decimal system
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
